name: txn
description: The validator received a verified, deduplicated transaction

source_ip.description: The source IP address of the transaction sender

source_port.description: The source port of the transaction sender

protocol.description: The protocol used to submit the transaction (e.g., QUIC, UDP, ...)

bundle_id.description: The ID of the bundle this transaction belongs to, if any.  Zero indicates not a bundle transaction

bundle_txn_count.description: The total number of transactions in the bundle this transaction belongs to, if any

bundle_commission.description: The commission percentage for the bundle this transaction belongs to, if any

bundle_commission_pubkey.description: The public key of the commission recipient for the bundle this transaction belongs to, if any
